question:
Which two statements are true about using the isUserInRole method to implement security in a
Java EE application? (Choose two.)

options.A: It can be invoked only from the doGet or doPost methods.
options.B: It can be used independently of the getRemoteUser method.
options.C: Can return “true” even when its argument is NOT defined as a valid role name in the deployment descriptor.
options.D: Using the isUserInRole method overrides any declarative authentication related to the method in which it is invoked.
options.E: Using the isUserInRole method overrides any declarative authorization related to the method in which it is invoked.
